infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Nooks Partner needs to access your camera roll so that you can update your profile picture of your account. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Nooks Partner needs to access your camera roll so that you can update your profile picture of your account. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Nooks Partner needs to access your camera roll so that you can update your profile picture of your account. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Nooks Partner requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Nooks Partner requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Nooks Partner requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Nooks Partner requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
